name: Esperanto learning game
description:
A prototype for learning Esperanto. Drag  words into blank space to form a sentence. Get the ball to reach the goal. So far it has 5 levels. It was built on an unfinished project we were previously working on. 

We made it to motivate ourselves to keep on learning Esperanto and hope it can help you as well. Please do tell us whether you think we should keep on working on this game and how things can be improved! :) We also welcome Esperanto experts to point out any errors in our game!

Please enjoy!
